name: sails.io.js
description: Javascript SDK for communicating w/ a Sails server via WebSockets/socket.io.

scripts.postpublish: cd dist && npm publish && cd .. && echo && echo '--' && echo 'Now, assuming you have not pushed up your automatic "npm version" commit+tag yet, run:' && echo "git tag -d v`npm show sails.io.js version` && git commit --amend -am '`npm show sails.io.js version`' && git tag v`npm show sails.io.js version`" && echo 'Then do:' && echo 'git push && git push --tags'

author: Mike McNeil <@mikermcneil> (http://balderdash.co/)
